title: National Mall and Memorial Parks: Management
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management             Management       The documents here are relative to the operation of the Park and various ongoing projects. Documents that are available for review on the Planning, Environment and Public Comment (PEPC) website will be marked.  Click here to go to the PEPC site to review and comment on those projects available for comment. Search for "National Mall and Memorial Parks" in the park section to find all projects open for review. For a list of current Construction Projects ongoing within the park click the link. Record of Determination to Partial and Temporary Closure of Washington Mon Grounds for Turf Renovation 2017-2018 Record of Determination to Partial and Temporary Closure of National Mall for Turf Renovation Nov-Dec 2016 Record of Determination to Partial and Temporary Closure of National Mall for Turf Renovation Aug-Sept 2016 Record of Determination to Close NAMA to Launching, Landing or Operation of Unmanned Aircraft (2014) Pedicab Commercial Use Application (2016) Pedicab CUA Application Supplement (2016) Revised Record of Decision for Pedicabs 2012 National Mall Plan (PEPC) Washington DC Transportation Study (signed FONSI) Superintendents Compendium  Environmental Assessment for the American Veterans Disabled for Life Memorial (PEPC)  Proposed Dwight D. Eisenhower Memorial EA (PEPC) Vietnam Veterans Memorial Center (PEPC)
